sentences.en: A firm order is often called an indent.

sentences.en: Bid will be evaluated strictly in accordance with the indent specifications.

sentences.en: Indent Code - Indents your code to a generally accepted style.
sentences.cn: 缩进代码 - 缩进您的代码以一种普遍接受的风格.

sentences.en: Indent comment at the same level of the code you are documenting.

sentences.en: Indent: To begin a line or lines with a blank space.
sentences.cn: 缩排: 字行缩进一固定空格,然后开始的排法.

sentences.en: Please make an indent at the begin of each paragraph.
Positive values indent the edge , negative values outdent the edge.
sentences.cn: 设置为整数表示缩进,设置为负数表示弹出.

sentences.en: The indent agent takes a commission on the value of his purchase.
sentences.cn: 这种订货代理商按所订购的货物价值收取佣金.

sentences.en: You must indent the first line of a new paragraph.
sentences.cn: 新起段落的首行你必须缩格书写.

sentences.en: You should always indent for your office requirements well in advance.
sentences.cn: 办公室所需用品你应该及早提出申请.
